version_description: fastPay is ready with its brand new face! With completely renewed clean design and menu shortcuts, fastPay invites you to its special world full of advantages. Enjoy fastPaying!
fastPay is ready with its brand new face! With completely renewed clean design and menu shortcuts, fastPay invites you to its special world full of advantages. Enjoy fastPaying!

• From now on, you can add credit cards of all banks to your fastPay and use for merchant payments!
• Withdrawing without card is even easier than usual! By the help of "Withdraw with Voice" feature, feel the ease of withdrawing money, with only using your voice, not touching on ATM.
• With fastPay Support Line, you can get help from DenizBank Call Center about fastPay.

• From now on, you can add credit cards of all banks to your fastPay and use for merchant payments!
• Withdrawing without card is even easier than usual! By the help of "Withdraw with Voice" feature, feel the ease of withdrawing money, with only using your voice, not touching on ATM.
• With fastPay Support Line, you can get help from DenizBank Call Center about fastPay.

• Thanks to iBeacon technology, you can be informed about nearby fastPay merchant campaigns and offers as long as you keep your bluetooth on.
• You can pay by instalments at contracted merchants with your DenizBank credit cards.
• You can get directions or make a voice call for fastPay merchants which are nearly 100.000!
• Feature of entering an information while transfering money.
• Now, foreign nationals who live in Turkey, can register for fastPay with their foreign identity number.

• Thanks to iBeacon technology, you can be informed about nearby fastPay merchant campaigns and offers as long as you keep your bluetooth on.
• You can pay by instalments at contracted merchants with your DenizBank credit cards.
• You can get directions or make a voice call for fastPay merchants which are nearly 100.000!
• Feature of entering an information while transfering money.
• Now, foreign nationals who live in Turkey, can register for fastPay with their foreign identity number.

• Optimized for iOS 8
• fastPay Help menu has been fixed

• Optimized for iOS 8
• fastPay Help menu has been fixed

• With the brand new "Deals" menu, you can take advantage of the special campaign and coupons at contracted merchants.
• Live the experience of payment with your credit card at the Taxis with fastPay logo.

• With the brand new "Deals" menu, you can take advantage of the special campaign and coupons at contracted merchants.
• Live the experience of payment with your credit card at the Taxis with fastPay logo.

• Here comes fastPay with its brand new design!
• "Recurring Payments" feature was added under Send Money menu.
• Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Here comes fastPay with its brand new design!
• "Recurring Payments" feature was added under Send Money menu.
• Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

• With the new payment source Qapel, now it’s possible to spend the Qapels at merchant payments and GSM top-up transactions.
• By the help of new login integration, it’s easier and safer just using PIN Code/Dot Lock instead of SMS password.
• Performance improvements.

• With the new payment source Qapel, now it’s possible to spend the Qapels at merchant payments and GSM top-up transactions.
• By the help of new login integration, it’s easier and safer just using PIN Code/Dot Lock instead of SMS password.
• Performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We have great updates for you in line with your reviews;
•24/7 bill payments from anywhere you like
•Money transfers and cash withdrawal with DenizBank credit cards
•Games of chance payments for DenizBank customers

We have great updates for you in line with your reviews;
•24/7 bill payments from anywhere you like
•Money transfers and cash withdrawal with DenizBank credit cards
•Games of chance payments for DenizBank customers

What’s new in version 6.0.6
We continue to update and add new features to our application based on your feedbacks.
Bug fixes and performance improvements has been made,
New features have been added to the user interface,
Security has been improved by identity confirmation.

What’s new in version 6.0.6
We continue to update and add new features to our application based on your feedbacks.
Bug fixes and performance improvements has been made,
New features have been added to the user interface,
Security has been improved by identity confirmation.

What’s new in version 6.0.7
We continue to update and add new features to our application based on your feedbacks.
Need money? With our new “Request Money” feature, you can now request money from other fastPay users.
With the “Notifications” menu, you can keep track of your fastPay processes and be informed of deals.
From the “Transaction Limits” button under the “Wallet” menu, you can now view your fastPay transaction limits.
With bug fixes and performance improvements, you can have better user experience.

What’s new in version 6.0.7
We continue to update and add new features to our application based on your feedbacks.
Need money? With our new “Request Money” feature, you can now request money from other fastPay users.
With the “Notifications” menu, you can keep track of your fastPay processes and be informed of deals.
From the “Transaction Limits” button under the “Wallet” menu, you can now view your fastPay transaction limits.
With bug fixes and performance improvements, you can have better user experience.

We continue to update and add new features to our application based on your feedbacks. 

Users who want to perform transactions to another bank, can now use the EFT function to send money to an IBAN number between EFT hours.

By saving your transactions and bill payments at the end of your process, you can perform even faster. You can also view your last 20 transactions and repeat them by tapping. 
You can send a receipt to an entered e-mail address, after a successful bill payment or IBAN EFT.

User interface has been enhanced.

Bug fixes and performance inprovements have been made.

We continue to update and add new features to our application based on your feedbacks. 

Users who want to perform transactions to another bank, can now use the EFT function to send money to an IBAN number between EFT hours.

By saving your transactions and bill payments at the end of your process, you can perform even faster. You can also view your last 20 transactions and repeat them by tapping.

User interface has been enhanced.

Bug fixes and performance inprovements have been made.

We continue to update and add new features to our application based on your feedbacks.
 
-          Your payments are even faster. By either flipping your phone horizontally or tapping “Pay with QR code”, you can create a QR code. By showing that code to the cashier, you can pay securely.
 
-          You don’t need to enter your card bin by hand anymore. Add your credit cards to fastPay even faster by using your phone camera.   
 
-          Bug fixes and performance inprovements have been made.
 
-          With improvements to interface fastPay is even more user friendly

We continue to update and add new features to our application based on your feedbacks.
 
-          Your payments are even faster. By either flipping your phone horizontally or tapping “Pay with QR code”, you can create a QR code. By showing that code to the cashier, you can pay securely.
 
-          You don’t need to enter your card bin by hand anymore. Add your credit cards to fastPay even faster by using your phone camera.   
 
-          Bug fixes and performance inprovements have been made.
 
-          With improvements to interface fastPay is even more user friendly

I’am renewed! Advantages and discounts are pouring from the sky! You’ll love us even more with our brand new design and functions. What is new in fastPay? 

·         Pay your bills easily via “Repeat” function
·         Pay your credit card dept with fastPay 
·         Top-up to the fastPay wallet with all debit cards
·         Benefit from dozens of offers such as A101, istanbulkart, Kentkart, Kahve Dünyası campaigns 
·         All of these without a cost!

“We have tidied the place up and done some dusting so that you could use it more easily.
 
And all you need to do is to enjoy the blessings of fastPay. :) ”

- Travel card facility initiated with istanbulkart is now available also for kentkart. With the new feature, kentkart users will be able to top up their travel cards instantly through their credit cards with no extra charge.
- With quick payment, you can directly reach the QR payment step.
- We have edited the messages viewed when you forget your password.
- We have made improvements in the English menu. Yes, indeed :)
Some fixes have been made at Istanbulkart top-ups and bill payments regarding user experience.

IstanbulKart top-up orders are at fastPay!
You can now give top-up orders for your IstanbulKart using fastPay balance or credit card. All you need to do is launch fastPay, tap on the bus icon and type your desired amount along with your IstanbulKart number.

-          You don’t need to enter your card bin by hand anymore. Add your credit cards to fastPay even faster by using your phone camera.   
 
-          Bug fixes and performance inprovements have been made.
 
-          With improvements to interface fastPay is even more user friendly

* Now you can pay your bills with your credit card. You can add any bank’s credit card to your fastPay and pay your utility bills any time.
* Performance improvements and other bug fixes have been applied.

* Bug fixes and performance inprovements have been made.

* Now you can pay your bills with your credit card. You can add any bank’s credit card to your fastPay and pay your utility bills any time.
* You can purchase digital codes in order to play games or have memberships from popular entertainment platforms such as: Steam, Origin, Battle.net, Spotify, Facebook etc.
* Bug fixes and performance inprovements have been made.

IstanbulKart top-up orders are at fastPay!
 
You can now give top-up orders for your IstanbulKart using fastPay balance or credit card. All you need to do is launch fastPay, tap on the bus icon and type your desired amount along with your IstanbulKart number.

I’am renewed! Advantages and discounts are pouring from the sky! Moreover, you will love us even more with our brand new design and functions. 
 
What is new in fastPay? 
 
•    Pay your credit card bills with fastPay 
•    Money top-up to the fastPay wallet with all Debit cards
•    Benefit from monthly special offers 
•    You can benefit from dozens of offers such as A101, istanbulkart, Kentkart, Kahve Dünyası campaigns 
•    You can do all of these without a cost! 

For further information please visit fastPay.com.tr 
We are awaiting your comments to improve our application.

We updated fastPay so you can pay safely at the new normal.
What's in the new fastPay?
 
•         You can make contactless payments in A101 and Migros. We have also taken new precautions so that you can pay more safely.
•         Follow our campaigns that you can benefit from without leaving your home.
•         You can now edit your quick menu!
·         We also improved our dotlock design.
 
Your comments are very valuable to us, please forward!

We updated fastPay so you can pay safely at the new normal.
What's in the new fastPay?

• You can make contactless payments in Migros, A101 and Carrefour via QR code. For better payment experience, please update your fastPay.
• You can now edit your quick menu!
• Use app shortcut feature and make payment directly.

Follow our campaigns that you can benefit from without leaving your home.

We’re always making changes and improvements to fastPay. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.
This version includes new features, several bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Meet the fastLoan! you can apply to fastLoan and see your money on fastPay in seconds. (Currently for DenizBank customer, coming soon for all users)
• Payment experience by QR code is improved. You can make contactless payments in Migros, A101, Carrefour and more.
• You can edit your quick menu.

We’re always making changes and improvements to fastPay. To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your Updates turned on.
This version includes new features, several bug fixes and performance improvements. 
 
* Meet the fastLoan! you can apply to fastLoan and see your money on fastPay in seconds. (Currently for DenizBank customer, coming soon for all users)
* Payment experience by QR code is improved. You can make contactless payments in Migros, A101, Carrefour and more.
* You can now create your own security question and update it anytime.
* You can follow the steps through which you have succeeded or failed to sign into the application.

We care for you in these times!

You can now use the loan you need instantly with the most favorable rates with fastKredi. (For only DenizBank customers for now, but soon all our users will be able to use fastKredi)

Turkey's 81 provinces in the A101, Migros, and Carrefour payment option with QR, now easier with fastPay.

Also, this version includes some performance improvements.
